New Records: Yusei Kikuchi struck out 12 batters in seven innings.
Cole Ragans set a Royals' franchise record with eight consecutive strikeouts.
Bobby Witt Jr. hit his 29th home run of the season.
Key Match Events: Astros scored five runs in the sixth inning.
Cole Ragans' strong start followed by the Royals' unraveling.
Bobby Witt Jr.'s eighth-inning home run.
Pre-Game Insights: Royals claimed Robbie Grossman and Tommy Pham off waivers.
Astros manager focused on starting pitching quality.
Post-Match Reflections: Royals manager Matt Quatraro on Cole Ragans' performance.
Bobby Witt Jr. on moving on from the loss.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game was played at Daikin Park in Houston, Texas.
Others: Astros' Alex Bregman was still sore but improving.
